card.name: Butthurt (bsun)
card.text:
You may only attack or target the face of this card.
{t} or {ut}: Add hurt counter to Butthurt.
You and face of this card take a shot for each hurt counter on Butthurt: Exile Butthurt.

card.name: Cocksgiving
card.text: Choose any number of players. Each player that takes a shot creates a 1/1 Potato creature token.
